summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2823, for the improvement of 45th Avenue Northeast, from East 45th street to East 50th Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 33905 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
